name: Spirit Hunter: Death Mark II
storyline:
There’s a strange rumor circulating around the prestigious Konoehara Academy, located in Tokyo’s H City.
“Shibito sentences you to death”
It all started a few weeks ago, when a student went missing. The day before their disappearance, a strange letter was posted on the school’s bulletin board. It read as follows:

Dear Ribbon,

Tonight, Hanako is going to kill you. I’ll be watching you from the confusion of the school.
Sincerely, Shibito
But when the police arrived, no one could find the letter. The student’s whereabouts are still unknown. And since then, more disturbing rumors have begun to spread.
"Hanako has to be that ghost haunting the school bathrooms.”
“The missing student must’ve been killed by Hanako!”
“Shibito might be someone in our school…”
Then, another message appeared. Shibito’s shadow foretells death, and more and more, unease continues to engulf the school…
And so, as summer comes to an end, a man arrives at Konoehara. Could this Shibito be a spirit? Or are they…
summary:
The third game in the Spirit Hunter series.

The story is set in a suburb of H City in Tokyo and revolves around Konoehara Academy, a school where gruesome events occur every ten years. The police are unable to explain the incidents, and classify them as accidents but they are rumored to be caused by spirits. Because of this, Konoehara's principal hires Kazuo Yashiki of the Kujo family to infiltrate the school as a teacher and investigate the incidents.
